participant_2.background:

when i am not touring with the band , i like to garden.
i m 49 , male and live in dublin , ireland.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
I enjoy a day of fishing on my viking boat.

content.text: I am great! How about you?
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, cooking, and fishing.
I like to spend time with my family and friends too. I also enjoy reading and gardening.
Gardening is a great way to relax and enjoy the outdoors. I'm always looking for new ways to make my home cooking more exciting.
I love trying new recipes too! I'm a bit of a foodie.
I'm a big fan of seafood. Do you like to fish?
I've never been fishing before, but it sounds like a lot of fun.
If you're ever in Ireland, I'll take you out on my Viking boat and show you how it's done!
That sounds like an amazing experience! I'd love to go fishing with you sometime.
